title: Damage Absorption
description: Allows an item to absorb damage that would otherwise be dealt to its wearer. The absorbed damage reduces the item's durability, with any excess damage being ignored. Requires the `minecraft:durability` component.

absorbable_causes.title: Absorbable Causes
absorbable_causes.description: List of damage causes that can be absorbed by the item. By default, no damage cause is absorbed.
